.column[.content[
# SSH Config
### ~/.ssh/config

```bash
Host github
  HostName gitlab.com
  AddKeysToAgent yes
  PreferredAuthentications publickey
  VisualHostKey=yes
  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa 
 
Host esgovcloud
  HostName esgovcloud.com
  AddKeysToAgent yes
  PreferredAuthentications publickey
  VisualHostKey=yes
  IdentityFile ~/.ssh/id_rsa
```
]]
.column[.content[
<h1> &nbsp; </h1>
.center[### Usage]
`ssh -T esgovcloud`<br>
`ssh -T github`<br>
etc ...
]]
